resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81638</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81638</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4806</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Athletics - (4) Running and Throwing</string>
            <string language="es">Atletismo – (4) Carreras y lanzamientos</string>
            <string language="ga">Lúthchleasaíocht – (4) Rith agus Caitheamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Athletik - (4) Laufen und Werfen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Athlétisme - (4) exécution et lancement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Athletics - (4) funcionar e jogar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Atletismo - (4) funzionare e gettare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητισμός - (4) τρέξιμο και ρίψη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson outlines running (sprinting and running over distance) and throwing activities. Children are encouraged to find out about running events and throwing events.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta lección describe las actividades de las carreras (carreras de velocidad y de fondo) y de lanzamiento. Se estimula a los niños a que descubran eventos relacionados con carreras y lanzamientos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Imlíníonn an ceacht seo gníomhaíochtaí rith (ráibeáil agus thar fhad) agus caitheamh. Spreagtar leanaí chun foghlaim faoi imeachtaí rith agus caithimh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion umreißt Betrieb (sprintender
und laufender Überabstand) und werfende Aktivitäten. Kinder 
werden angeregt, über laufende Fälle und werfende Fälle 
herauszufinden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon trace les grandes lignes du 
fonctionnement (distance finie sprinting et fonctionnante) et des 
activités de lancement. Des enfants sont encouragés à 
découvrir au sujet des événements courants et des événements de 
lancement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição esboça o corredor (distância 
excedente sprinting e funcionando) e atividades jogando. As 
crianças são incentivadas encontrar para fora sobre eventos running 
e eventos jogando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione descrive il funzionamento (distanza
eccessiva sprinting e funzionante) e le attività gettanti. I 
bambini sono consigliati a scoprire circa gli eventi correnti e gli 
eventi gettanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα περιγράφει το τρέξιμο (να τρέξει 
γρήγορα και το τρέξιμο πέρα από την απόσταση) και τη ρίψη των 
δραστηριοτήτων. Τα παιδιά ενθαρρύνονται για να ανακαλύψουν 
για το τρέξιμο των γεγονότων και τη ρίψη των γεγονότων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
